entry.string: Take this time to customize your installation to match your needs. Use the Modules administration to install any additional features, and use the Blocks administration to adjust the look of your sidebars.
entry.translation: Teke-a thees teeme-a tu coostumeeze-a yuoor instelleshun tu metch yuoor needs. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Use-a zee Mudooles edmeenistreshun tu instell uny eddeeshunel feetoores, und use-a zee Blucks edmeenistreshun tu edjoost zee luuk ooff yuoor seedebers. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: You are strongly advised to remove write access to html/var/config.system.php once the install has completed. This can be done on UNIX using the command
entry.translation: Yuoo ere-a strungly edfeesed tu remufe-a vreete-a eccess tu html/fer/cunffeeg.system.php oonce-a zee instell hes cumpleted. Bork bork bork! Thees cun be-a dune-a oon UNIX useeng zee cummund
frum veethin zee html/fer durectury. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: If you are feeling even more security conscious you could remove read access from those who don't need it
entry.translation: Iff yuoo ere-a feeleeng ifee mure-a secooreety cunsceeuoos yuoo cuoold remufe-a reed eccess frum thuse-a vhu dun't need it

entry.string: (substitute "apache" for the group your webserver runs as, probably one of apache, web, www or www-data)
entry.translation: (soobsteetoote-a "epeche-a" fur zee gruoop yuoor vebserfer roons es, prubebly oone-a ooff epeche-a, veb, vvv oor vvv-deta)
